article.title: Status and history for [kan]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: corrections, thanks to Sriranga, Sathyanarayanarao Magadi Nanjappa, and Steve White.
stage 4: full version provided by Kumari Co Ltd. via the Language Observatory.
stage 3: OHCHR identified as the source, partial XML contributed by Adobe Systems (from the partial data at ).
